Class GuiHelper

java.lang.Object
org.pokemondatabase.GUI.GuiHelper
public class GuiHelper extends Object
PURPOSE/PRIMARY FUNCTION

Used to be called by all GUI pages to perform necessary GUI designs and processes.

IMPORTANT DEPENDENCIES
  • All other pages: All GUI pages call this helper to create base panels, buttons, text, and all other important items.

  • Field Details

    • foregroundPanel

      public JPanel foregroundPanel

    • titleFont

      public final Font titleFont
      Font styles used throughout the application.

      Each font for each GUI element:

      • titleFont – Main page titles.
      • labelFont – Labels and text elements.
      • smallButtonFont – Smaller buttons and controls.
      • inputFont – Text input fields (Courier New, plain, 16pt).
      • errorFont – Displaying error messages (Courier New, bold, 12pt).
      • successFont – Success notifications.
      • pokemonListFont – Pokémon list item text.
      • bigFont – Large headings or emphasis.

    • labelFont

      public final Font labelFont

    • smallButtonFont

      public final Font smallButtonFont

    • inputFont

      public final Font inputFont

    • errorFont

      public final Font errorFont

    • addPokemonList

      public JScrollPane addPokemonList(List<Pokemon> pokemonDB, List<Pokemon> filteredPokemonList)
      Creates a listPanel, adds each Pokémon to the list panel with createPokémonListItem, creates a scroll pane, adds list panel to it and adds it to the foreground panel
      Parameters:
      pokemonDB - List of Pokémon
      filteredPokemonList - List of Filtered Pokémon
      Returns:
      JScrollPane

    • updatePokemonList

      public JScrollPane updatePokemonList(List<Pokemon> convertedPokemonDB, List<Pokemon> filteredPokemonList)
      Takes the scrollPane that was created above and replaces the list with the new list give in the parameter
      Parameters:
      convertedPokemonDB - List of Pokémon converted from the DB
      filteredPokemonList - List of Filtered Pokémon
      Returns:
      JScrollPane

    • createPokemonListItem

      public JPanel createPokemonListItem(Pokemon pokemon, List<Pokemon> pokemonDB)
      Creates a panel, adds an image depending on if the Pokémon has been caught or not, adds the Pokédex Number and Pokémon Name, adds a button so that it will go to the specified Pokémon page if clicked.
      Parameters:
      pokemon - Specific Pokémon
      pokemonDB - List of Pokémon converted from DB
      Returns:
      JPanel
